title: Menu for connection tree
author: msmigiel
body_snippet:
To save screen space, it would be very helpful to have the connection tree also as a menu (along with File, View, etc...). This way I could close the Connections panel and still access everything through a menu, saving space on lower resolution screens. Something like "Connections" and then a hierarchical menu with folders, connections, etc... would work nicely.

This currently is somewhat achievable if you show the Quick Connect Toolbar as clicking on the little blue globe has this informatio...
